fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Potion Mastery**: Each night, you can brew a special potion. You have three types of potions at your disposal: **Toxic Elixir**, **Mind-Control Serum**, and **Antidote**.
- **Toxic Elixir**: Target a player, poisoning them. Poisoned players will die in two nights unless they receive an Antidote.
- **Mind-Control Serum**: Target a player and make them target another player of your choice the following night. This effect lasts for two nights.
- **Antidote**: Use on a poisoned player to cure them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your potions become more potent:
- **Toxic Elixir**: Now kills the poisoned player in one night instead of two.
- **Mind-Control Serum**: The mind control effect lasts for three nights.
- **Antidote**: Cures a poisoned player instantly.
